mapper.select: select s.id,s.type_name,s.description,st.type_name stype_name,count(o.service_id)orderNum from tb_service s left join tb_order_info o on o.service_id = s.id left join tb_service_type st on st.id = s.service_type_id GROUP BY s.id ORDER BY orderNum desc limit #{start},#{pageSize}

select count(A.id) from (select s.id,s.type_name,s.description,st.type_name stype_name,count(o.service_id)orderNum from tb_service s left join tb_order_info o on o.service_id = s.id left join tb_service_type st on st.id = s.service_type_id GROUP BY s.id)A
